title: Champion points are all "N/A".
body:
[Picture of the champion page](http://imgur.com/a/oKrcF)

As you can see from this picture, nothing is showing on my account or my sister's account. (Both from OCE servers)

Is there a glitch with the system or were they reset for some reason? Sorry if the question is silly...

Thanks for any help.

replies.body: You probably already know, but the issue has been resolved! In the future you can always check our [Server Status Page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for updates on issues taking place in League. I and the BroPoros will also work to get notifications up on the boards for you guys/gals as well :)
